articles.author: Sapna Das
articles.title: Oil PSUs record fluctuations in fuel sales in September first fortnight — Petrol soars, diesel, ATF slumps - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Petrol sales recorded 8.8 percent month-on-month (MoM) hike while diesel sales, however, displayed a somewhat mixed performance, with 0.8 percent MoM increase and a decline of 5.8 percent on year-on-year basis.
